doc:
Josh Ryan Evans https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Josh_Ryan_Evans 0 Joshua Ryan Evans (January 10, 1982 – August 5, 2002) was an American actor who became known for his role of Timmy Lenox in the soap opera Passions. Though he was 17 years old when Passions debuted, Evans had the appearance and voice of a small child due to achondroplasia, a form of dwarfism. He was 3 feet 2 inches (97 cm) tall. Joshua_Ryan_Evans ( January_10_,_1982 – August_5_,_2002 ) was an_American_actor who became_known for his_role of Timmy_Lenox in the_soap_opera_Passions . Though he was 17_years old when Passions debuted , Evans had the_appearance_and_voice of a_small_child due to achondroplasia , a_form of dwarfism . He was 3_feet 2_inches ( 97_cm ) tall .
